description: I am a Senior Frontend Engineer with extensive experience in architecting scalable frontend systems for AI, ERP, and B2B domains. I specialize in React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript, while actively leading frontend teams through the full SDLC. My role involves sprint planning, task estimation, and assigning work to team members, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality code. I am passionate about mentoring junior developers, establishing code quality standards, and driving Agile best practices to foster continuous improvement and innovation.
